title: Mirror Content
body:
You can use an already created/formatted node’s template to create a new book page using this content type. The new page created will retain all of the settings/styles of the original book page. By this way you don't need to re-create anything from scratch while wanting to create a page similar to the one already created.

You can call the original content using its “Title”. Once the mirror content is saved, a new node is created having all the content, styles & settings of the original node.
